title: Teachable Machine 1: Image Classification
description: Introducing Teachable Machine 2.0 (from Google Creative Lab)!  Train a computer to recognize your own images, sounds, & poses. In this video, I train an image classifier and import the machine learning model into a p5.js sketch with the ml5.js library.
